channel.title: lol-culture on Yuvi Panda
channel.description: Recent content in lol-culture on Yuvi Panda

item.title: English Translation of ‘Tamil Hip Hop’ song
item.description: This is a best effort translation of the song ‘Clubbule Mabbule‘ (Drunk in a Club) from Tamil to English. Fuck, get lost. This is modern culture, eh? If you call this westernization modern culture, then this song is dedicated right for you. Hip hop tamizha, your Aaadheeee. Women roaming around drunk in clubs What the fuck is happening in Tamil Nadu I salute you all All your honor is flying away
